name: alogocode
title: Alogocode
desc: A sleek and responsive developer portfolio built with Astro, combining the power of TypeScript, React, and Tailwind CSS for a modern web experience. This template features elegant UI components from shadcn/ui, interactive icons with react-icons, and smooth scrolling effects powered by locomotive-scroll. The codebase is clean and well-structured, formatted with Prettier for consistency.
article:
Modern Developer Portfolio with Astro

A sleek and responsive developer portfolio built with Astro, combining the power of TypeScript, React, and Tailwind CSS for a modern web experience. This template features elegant UI components from shadcn/ui, interactive icons with react-icons, and smooth scrolling effects powered by locomotive-scroll. The codebase is clean and well-structured, formatted with Prettier for consistency.

Perfect for showcasing projects, skills, and personal branding with a polished and professional design.
